content: Cut selected items to the clipboard

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the action of cutting selected items to the clipboard when a shortcut key combination (Ctrl + v) is pressed. It appears in a UI component indicating available hotkeys. The goal is to provide clear instructions for users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Seçilmiş elementləri mübadilə buferinə kopyalayın" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Cut selected items to the clipboard." "Cut" implies removal, while the translation uses "kopyalayın" (copy). "Mübadilə buferinə" translates to 'swap buffer' which isn't standard terminology for clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seçilmiş elementləri silin və kəsik lövhəsinə köçürün

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vyjmutí vybraných položek do schránky" is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Cut selected items to the clipboard'. 'Vyjmutí' implies an action being performed by someone.  'Cut' typically means the action is being done *to* the items. 'Vystřižení' would be a better translation for 'Cut' in this context, focusing on the cutting action itself.
While not strictly incorrect, 'Vystřižení vybraných položek do schránky' can be slightly improved for fluency. Using a more active phrasing can make it sound better.
The word 'սեղմատախտակի' (slegmatakhdaki) is a literal translation of 'clipboard' and might sound unnatural. A more common and natural equivalent in Armenian might be 'ժողովածու' (zhoghovats).

The translation 'Tagliare gli elementi selezionati negli appunti' is a literal translation but doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Cut to the clipboard'. 'Tagliare' implies deleting the items, while 'Cut' in this context means copying them to the clipboard without deleting them.  A more accurate translation would focus on copying.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Copiare gli elementi selezionati negli appunti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຄລິບບອດ' is often written as 'ຄລິບບອດ'. While both are understood, 'ຄລິບບອດ' is the more common and preferred spelling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕັດລາຍການທີ່ເລືອກໃສ່ຄລິບບອດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Wytnij zaznaczone pliki do schowka' literally translates to 'Cut selected files to the clipboard'. The English refers to 'items' not 'files'. While 'files' might be implied, 'items' is more generic and accurate in this context.
The translation 'Decupare elemente selectate în clipboard' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Romanian. 'Cut' is best translated as 'Taie'.
While 'clipboard' is understood, it is more common to use the Romanian equivalent, 'aglomează' or 'aglomarea'.

The translation "තෝරාගත් අථක කපන්න" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Cut selected items to the clipboard."  'අථක' (athaka) refers to material or substance and isn't the correct term for 'items'. The verb 'කපන්න' (kapanna) is correct for 'cut' but needs to be in the context of selecting items.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් වස්තුවල ප්‍රමාණය ක්ලිප්බෝඩ්ට පිටපත් කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a single, long sentence. While not strictly incorrect, it may be better suited for UI by breaking it into two shorter phrases.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් වස්තුවල ප්‍රමාණය පිටපත් කරන්න. ක්ලිප්බෝඩ්ට පිටපත් වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Vyrezať vybrané položky do schránky' while technically correct, doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'Cut selected items to the clipboard.' 'Cut' has a specific meaning in this context, relating to moving data, and 'Vyrezať' (to cut physically) might be misleading. A more accurate translation would emphasize the 'move' or 'remove and copy' action.
The term 'привремену меморију' translates to 'temporary memory' which isn't the common or natural way to refer to a clipboard in Serbian. 'Исеци' is correct for 'Cut'.

The translation 'Iseci odabrane stavke na privremenu memoriju' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Cut selected items to the clipboard'. 'Iseci' implies cutting in a destructive sense, whereas 'Cut' in this context refers to copying to the clipboard. A more accurate translation would convey the action of copying to the clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kopiraj odabrane stavke na privremenu memoriju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'privremenu memoriju' is a more literal translation of 'clipboard.' A more common term might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kopiraj odabrane stavke na isečnu tablu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Seçilen öğeleri panoya kes' lacks the colon (:) at the end of the sentence, consistent with the English source and common UI text formatting.

The translation 'Вирізати вибрані елементи до буфера обміну' is a literal translation and not the most natural way to express this in Ukrainian. 'Cut' implies moving the items, not just copying.  A better translation would convey this action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Перемістити вибрані елементи до буфера обміну

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the word 'буфера' (buffer) is better written as 'буферу' in this context to agree with 'обміну' (clipboard).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вирізати вибрані елементи до буферу обміну

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Cắt các mục đã chọn vào bộ nhớ tạm" is a literal translation but doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Cut selected items to the clipboard' in a user-friendly way. 'Bộ nhớ tạm' translates to 'temporary storage' which is a technical term. A more natural phrasing would be to focus on the action of cutting and pasting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cắt các mục đã chọn và lưu vào bảng nhớ tạm
